safe_in_template.description: Usage of the "safe" tag might lead to cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. Please review if input comes only from trusted sources (e.g. not from the user).

autoescape_off.description: Disabled autoescape might lead to cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. Please review if input comes only from trusted sources (e.g. not from the user).

template_variable_inside_script_tag.description: Template variables without encoding inside SCRIPT tags might lead to cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. Please ensure that input can only come from trusted sources (e.g. not from the user).

javascript_target.description: 'javascript:' is used to run Javascript code which might lead to cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. Please ensure that input can only come from trusted sources (e.g. not from the user).

dom_event_parameter.description: HTML DOM events run Javascript code which might lead to cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. Please ensure that input can only come from trusted sources (e.g. not from the user).

raw_query.description: Raw queries might lead to sql injections. Please review if input comes only from trusted sources (e.g. not from the user).

json_no_content_type.description: HTTP response containing possibly json data without content_type set

http_response.description: Simple HTTP response, might worth a look...

basic_auth_in_source.description: Row possibly contains basic auth containing secret

http_variable_used.description: HTTP variable (GET, POST, FILES, META) used

backbonejs_model_get.description: possible unsafe data usage from model (user supplied + written back = baad)

backbonejs_unsanitized_html.description: possibly unsanitized html usage (user supplied, not escaped = baad)

unsafe_underscore_js_template.description: possibly unsafe template usage (underscoreJS AND user supplied = baad)

csrf_exempt.description: new csrf exempt, please check it

redirect_field_usage.description: redirect field usage, please check if input is validated

oauth_string.description: oauth string appeared, check it plz

interesting_object_get.description: getting object by request data, check it plz

jsonp_middleware.description: new jsonp middleware, check if no sensitive info is given back

jsonp_usage.description: jsonp usage, check if no sensitive info is given back

csharp_sql_command.description: possible SQL query, please check it for user supplied input and hardcoded connection creds

csharp_base64.description: using base64, please check if not used for enCRAPtion

csharp_invokescript.description: Please check if safe script is invoked.

csharp_storage.description: New windows storage, please check if no sensitive/encrypted

urlopen.description: urlopen/pycurl can open local files (and a lot more, e.g. telnet), please watch for it, _make_call is a wrapper we use

new_vhost.description: new vhost in chef, please check if not sensitive, has default vhost and properly protected by godauth

unsafe_as_calls.description: possibly malicious AS function call, please check if user supplied input is used (https://code.google.com/p/doctype-mirror/wiki/ArticleFlashSecurityLoadMovie, https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Testing_for_Cross_site_flashing_(OWASP-DV-004))

unsafe_as_htmlText.description: possibly malicious AS function call, please check if user supplied input is used (https://code.google.com/p/doctype-mirror/wiki/ArticleFlashSecurityLoadMovie, https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Testing_for_Cross_site_flashing_(OWASP-DV-004))

cpp_system_popen_calls.description: the affected function will run a command, please check if no unvalidated user input is used

cpp_bof_calls.description: the affected function doesn't check destination buffer boundaries, therefore they can lead to BOF vulns

cpp_format_string.description: please check the fn call if user data is read directly and it is possible to include format strings...

java_interesting_calls.description: file reading / sql is always interesting

scala_interesting_calls.description: file access / cmd exec is interesting (big false positive ratio, but it is OK now)
